updates.text: ADDED: New blog post added, new webpage link that outlines updates made on the website.
CHANGED: Navigation bar no longer stays on the right side of the screen at all times, and no longer only displays the relevant text when hovered over.
ADDED: 'Hamburger' style drop down menu added to phone or small screen size for navigation.
FIXED: Contact page now works after breaking, the submit button now generates a email on the user client.
REMOVED: portfolio navigation page removed, both computer science and blender portfolio pages combined into new page.
